name: AVENGE
short_description:
AVENGE – The Advanced Vulnerability Exploit Generation Environment is a fully automated, state-of-the-art, software tool designed to discover zero-day vulnerabilities in software and generate full proof of concept (POC) exploits. It is the result of over 15 years of research and development in the evolving science of software vulnerability assessment and exploitation.

At its core, AVENGE utilizes a combination of Artificial Intelligence, Neural-Networks, and Machine Learning heuristics to detect vulnerable and exploitable functions and procedures in software  with a high degree of accuracy. In laboratory settings as well as third-party validation experiments, AVENGE has detected exploitable vulnerabilities with an average accuracy rate of over 98%.

AVENGE detects the presence of vulnerable and exploitable functions and procedures. It is also capable of generating proof of concept code in three varieties: Standalone Executables, Metasploit Modules, and Assembly Language.
